description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 5x + 2.
comments: n, 5*n+2, 25*n+12, 125*n+62, 625*n+312 and 3125*n+1562 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..10000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(5*n+2) and IsPrime(25*n+12) and IsPrime(125*n+62) and IsPrime(625*n+312) and IsPrime(3125*n+1562)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
